analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/19/0xf3e3f649771651368d89dd6fefc57c77dceb6f78.sol:
	Contract BitMaxProToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/19/0xf3e3f649771651368d89dd6fefc57c77dceb6f78.sol#218)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/19/0xf3e3f649771651368d89dd6fefc57c77dceb6f78.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
